Pro-bailout conservatives win pivotal Greek election

The pro-bailout New Democracy party came in first today in Greece's election, and its leader has proposed forming a pro-euro coalition government. (AP, 4:59 p.m.)

21 killed in Nigerian church blasts

Three suicide bomb attacks on churches rocked a northern Nigerian state Sunday, killing at least 21 people and wounding about 100, officials said, prompting protests in a state that has previously been strained by religious tensions.
